function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with the built environment","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases leading to illness and possible fatalities","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough sanitation of built environment, implementation of ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Disinfectant sprayers, UV-C disinfection systems, high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters","People":"Occupants, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facility operators, cleaning and maintenance staff"}]}
